subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The United States Walker Cup captain Buddy Marucci won the U.S.G.A. Senior Amateur, beating George Zahringer, 2-up, at Shady Oaks Country Club in Fort Worth.
snippet: The United States Walker Cup captain Buddy Marucci won the U.S.G.A. Senior Amateur, beating George Zahringer, 2-up, at Shady Oaks Country Club in Fort Worth.
